body_html: Eh good point. It's hard to tell the difference between key mismatches and parameters that were None at the time of a checkpoint 😕 I'm not sure what's a good solution here. I'm a bit worried about putting Nones into state dicts, as they might make their processing a bit harder.
body_text: Eh good point. It's hard to tell the difference between key mismatches and parameters that were None at the time of a checkpoint 😕 I'm not sure what's a good solution here. I'm a bit worried about putting Nones into state dicts, as they might make their processing a bit harder.
body: Eh good point. It's hard to tell the difference between key mismatches and parameters that were `None` at the time of a checkpoint 😕 I'm not sure what's a good solution here. I'm a bit worried about putting `None`s into state dicts, as they might make their processing a bit harder.
